name: couplet
content:

Add to word list
two lines of poetry next to each other, especially ones that rhyme (= have words with the same sounds) and have the same length and rhythm: a rhyming couplet

literature a pair of lines in a poem, esp. when connected by rhythm, rhyme (= words that end with the same sound), or meaning
